text: (dūtarē, avanu) eṇṭu jotegaḷannu sr̥ṣṭisiruvanu. Kurigaḷalli eraḍu bage hāgū āḍugaḷalli eraḍu bage. Nīvu hēḷiri; ‘‘ī paiki allāhanu niṣēdhisiruvudu eraḍū bageya gaṇḍu vargadavugaḷannō athavā heṇṇu vargadavugaḷannō athavā eraḍū bageya heṇṇu vargada prāṇigaḷa garbhadalliruvavugaḷannō? Nīvu satyavantarāgiddare. Jñānada ādhāradalli nanage tiḷisiri’’
